name: Aw Nutz
description: Have you ever wanted to be a nut? How about a pistachio? Well, now you can! Choose from a wide variety of legumes and assorted nuts as you try flinging into the mouths of your enemies. Play with friends or with complete strangers as 1 human with nut allergies vs. 5 nuts!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD 2.3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 /AMD Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
